TopicTitle: How to kill 2 contracts with one ship

Articles.Content:
Sooo I had a contract to build a space station over kerbin, and Another one over minmus. This is what I did:

[http://i.imgur.com/FIZ0A1r.png](http://i.imgur.com/FIZ0A1r.png)

waited long enough for the contract to complete

And then proceedd to Minmus ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

[http://imgur.com/FIZ0A1r,TOPpj2S,toAYuic#2](http://imgur.com/FIZ0A1r,TOPpj2S,toAYuic#2)
You double-posted, dude! Also, embed pictures with [ img ] image url [ /img ] tags, without the spaces.
I do this with satellite missions. I get three in a row for around Kerbin/Mun/Minmus and complete them all.

> 
> I do this with satellite missions. I get three in a row for around Kerbin/Mun/Minmus and complete them all.

...And launch the sat in a SSTO with seats for paying tourists. My favourite money earner and new "recruits" that were too eager to get to space (rescue missions). I don't do Minmus, though, too long a transfer for a quick buck... you can do dozens of contracts by the time the sat gets there.

Rune. Milk those contracts!
The best is when you get an orbital station contract and a surface outpost contract for the same planet/moon. Park your base in orbit, get paid; land it on the surface, get paid more!
